Title: Relates to creating the health emergency response data system
Summary: Relates to creating the health emergency response data system, which collects information and statistical data relating to public health emergencies in order to assist the department of health, other government entities, health care providers, and the public in understanding and responding to public health emergencies.
LawCode: Add & amd ยง206-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to creating the health emergency response data system
